contents.text: Thank you for calling Instacart in San Francisco, delivering groceries in as little as one hour.
To place a new grocery delivery order, press 1.
To speak with a sales specialist about our delivery options, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our sales team. Your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: I’d like to review different delivery plan options for my weekly grocery orders.
I’m an ex-military veteran and need help placing a new grocery delivery order and reviewing the available delivery options.
Connect me to sales to discuss delivery API integration and pricing tiers.
I’d like to discuss delivery plans and fees before placing an order.
I’d like to speak with a specialist about your delivery schedules and pricing options.

contents.text: To learn about current promotions and savings, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve the latest promotions. Thank you for your patience.

navigationGoals: I need to find current discounts or promo codes for my upcoming Instacart purchase.
I’d like to learn about any current promotions or veteran discounts before I place my grocery order.
Retrieve details on current promotions and discount structures.
I’d like to hear about your current promotions and any senior discounts.
I want information on your current promotions and how to apply any available discounts.

contents.text: For order support and existing orders, press 2.
To track the status of your current order, press 1.
Please hold while we look up your order status. We appreciate your patience.

navigationGoals: I want to check the estimated arrival time for my current order.
I need to track the status of my current Instacart grocery delivery.
Provide a real-time status update for my current order.
Can you tell me when my grocery order will arrive?
I need an update on the delivery status of my existing grocery order.

contents.text: To modify or cancel an existing order, press 2.
Please hold while we process your request. Please stay on the line.

navigationGoals: I need to update an item in my existing order before it ships.
I need to modify or cancel the grocery order I already placed due to a schedule change.
Modify or cancel my existing order.
I need to add an item to my existing order.
I’d like to modify my current order by removing or swapping out an item.
